name: Diggy Jump Man
description:
Made with GODOT

CONTROLS

LEFT RIGHT for move
SPACE for jump
CTRL for break block below
DOWN for move blocks down one slot faster

Clear lines. Lines make the blocks above loose and collapse onto the holes as well. Combos multiply points (or intends to). Fail state similar to the other game with line clears.

GRAPHICS:
https://s4m-ur4i.itch.io/huge-pixelart-asset-pack

SOUND EFFECTS:
https://beepyeah.itch.io/8-bit-sfx-pack

MUSIC MADE WITH:
https://terrycavanagh.itch.io/bosca-ceoil
